title: [K-12] Teacher Professional Development Through Online Collaborative Design: Focus on Social Studies Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ICT utilization skills and experience in teaching social studies
context.additional_context: Process where preservice teachers collaboratively design social studies learning scenarios online using the ILDE platform, strengthening ICT integration competencies. Focuses on cultivating practical lesson design skills through project-based evaluations.

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively design at least three learning scenarios based on social studies subjects using the ILDE platform.
Learners can effectively utilize online collaboration tools (e.g., Zoom, ILDE) to achieve over 90% success in real-time feedback processes with peer teachers.
Learners can integrate at least two ICT tools (e.g., digital content, collaboration platforms) into designed scenarios to complete projects that meet evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
